# About

- ### This application lets a user know the overview of COVID19 cases in India.

- ### It is written in Shiny which is a web application framework for R.

- ### It leverages the **googleVis** library for displaying the map.

- ### It is hosted on Rstudio's shiny server in the cloud (Shinyapps.io)

# Using the App

- ### Pick the type of cases you want to know about

- ### Hover over a state, to know the details. 

- ### Higher intensity of color would mean higher number of cases of the particular type.
